registry.title: DeviceManufacturer
registry.description: Manufacturer is electronically stored on the device. Different Devices may use different conventions to provide their information. Need to be able to Standardize as much as possible with a uniform naming convention.
registry.note: A new entry to DeviceManufacturer requires a description of the value, and justification for adding a new classification. Requires an update to NENA 71-001.
